---
title: "DCQC Quality Checklist Report"
author: "`r params$reviewer_name`"
date: "`r format(params$report_date, '%d %B %Y')`"
output: rtf_document
params:
  paper_title: "Example Paper"
  reviewer_name: "Example Reviewer"
  journal_name: "Example Journal"
  report_date: !r Sys.Date()
  card_data: !r list()
---

**`r params$paper_title`**

*`r params$journal_name`*

---

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
for (item in params$card_data) {
  cat(paste0("### ", item$label, "\n\n"))
  cat("**Response:** ", ifelse(is.null(item$response), "Not answered", item$response), "\n\n")
  cat("**Comment:** ", ifelse(is.null(item$comment) || item$comment == "", "No comment provided.", item$comment), "\n\n")
}
